name: Range Rover Sport
description: The Range Rover Sport combines luxury and performance with a spacious interior, advanced off-road capability, and a refined driving experience.

name: Rolls Royce Ghost
description: The Rolls Royce Ghost offers unmatched luxury with handcrafted interiors, a powerful V12 engine, and a serene driving experience designed for elegance.

name: Porsche Taycan
description: The Porsche Taycan is a high-performance electric sports car delivering instant acceleration, advanced technology, and iconic Porsche design.
